evidence_example.title: SPI Flash demo
evidence_example.small_descr: This is the demo to test software SPI Flash on FPG-EYE Board devices.
evidence_example.long_descr:
SPI Flash demo.

User can use this demo to learn how to write to and read from SST25LF0X0A SPI flash mounted on the XP2 camera board.

The demo requires a RS232 serial connection with user PC (115200 bps, 8N1 configuration).
